= name( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments are contained within the item's name


== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = string(s) to search for

== Remarks ==
  * lua string patterns can be used, see http://code.google.com/p/arkinventory/wiki/RuleFunction_StringMatching

== Examples ==

`name( elixir, potion )`

`name( scroll of )`
